data.actual_result: When you unmute yourself, you still remain deafened.
data.expected_result: Like Desktop Canary, when you unmute while deafened, you will no longer be deafened.
data.short_description: While on a voice channel, you can unmute yourself, but still be deafened. The Trello card for this says fixed, it's not.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel - Deafen and mute yourself - Unmute yourself and you will still be deafened
